column4: I originally partitioned windows on my last reformat to have 20 gb spare for ubuntu. Today, I installed ubuntu on the free space, and now on boot I get 'error loading operating system'. What can I do?
dual booting winxp/ubuntu - pre-configured the hdd to have 20gb spare for ubuntu, and installed it there - now stuck at 'error loading operating system'
Does GRUB come up at all?
Try booting a LiveCD and running "grub-install /dev/yourharddrive"
